entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:50 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 06:50 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or ice pellets. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets near noon then to rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:50 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
